en.title: AI Breakthrough in Medical Diagnosis
en.content: Researchers have developed an AI system that can detect early signs of diseases with 95% accuracy. The system analyzes medical images and patient data to identify patterns invisible to the human eye.
en.takeaway: AI could revolutionize early disease detection.
en.source: Journal of Medical AI Research, Vol. 12, Issue 4

ar.title: طفرة في الذكاء الاصطناعي لتشخيص الأمراض
ar.content: طور الباحثون نظام ذكاء اصطناعي يمكنه اكتشاف العلامات المبكرة للأمراض بدقة 95٪. يحلل النظام الصور الطبية وبيانات المرضى لتحديد الأنماط غير المرئية للعين البشرية.
ar.takeaway: يمكن للذكاء الاصطناعي أن يحدث ثورة في الكشف المبكر عن الأمراض.
ar.source: مجلة أبحاث الذكاء الاصطناعي الطبي، المجلد 12، العدد 4

en.title: Gaza Death Disparity: 10,000 Palestinians Under Rubble vs. One Israeli Recovered
en.content: Three reports today reveal Israel's staggering moral calculus in Gaza. While launching major military operations to recover a single soldier's body, 10,000 Palestinians remain trapped under rubble - unnamed, unclaimed. Meanwhile, despite announced ceasefires, attacks continue: 3 more Palestinians killed today in Gaza City. The total death toll now stands at 71,660 Palestinians dead with 171,419 injured since October 2023. This isn't just military asymmetry; it's a system that values Israeli life with forensic precision while treating Palestinian death as statistical collateral.
en.takeaway: Israel's Gaza campaign shows occupation's brutal math: forensic recovery for occupiers, mass graves for the occupied - proving even in death, Palestinians are denied basic dignity.
